remarks: Contraposition law for orthoposets.  ( ~ chsscon3 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2011.)
statement:
opcon3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
opcon3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
opcon3.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
oplecon3b $p |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> ( ._|_ ` Y ) .<_ ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) $.
